flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEATnusing a sweet fragrance. Once thenVOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMONfleads the lit-up swarm in drawingngeometric designs on the canvas ofnthe night sky.
ILLUMISE leads a flight of illuminatednVOLBEAT to draw signs in the night sky.nThis POKéMON is said to earn greaterfrespect from its peers by composingnmore complex designs in the sky.
A nocturnal POKéMON that becomes activenupon nightfall. It leads a VOLBEAT swarmnto draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200ndifferent patterns have been confirmed.
It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in nightnskies. There are scientists that study thenpatterns it creates.
It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in nightnskies. There are scientists that study thenpatterns it creates.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVOLBEAT to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVOLBEAT to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVOLBEAT to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
Its fragrance attracts a swarm ofnVOLBEAT, so they draw over 200npatterns in the night sky.
Its fragrance attracts a swarm ofnVOLBEAT, so they draw over 200npatterns in the night sky.
Il utilise son doux parfum pour aidernMuciole à décrire des arabesquesndans le ciel nocturne.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVolbeat to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
Il utilise son doux parfum pour aidernMuciole à décrire des arabesquesndans le ciel nocturne.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVolbeat to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVolbeat to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
With its sweet aroma, it guidesnVolbeat to draw signs with light innthe night sky.
あまい　かおりで　バルビートをnゆうどうして　２００　いじょうのnもようを　よぞらに　えがく。
달콤한 향기로 볼비트를n유도해서 200개 이상의n모양을 밤하늘에 그린다.
Il utilise son doux parfum pour aider Muciole à décrirenplus de 200 arabesques dans le ciel nocturne.
Sein süßer Duft leitet Volbeat an,nüber 200 verschiedene Lichtmusternan den Nachthimmel zu malen.
Con su dulce aroma guía a grupos de Volbeat paranque tracen hasta 200 dibujos distintos en el cielonnocturno.
Con un dolce aroma dirige il volo dei Volbeat, chendisegnano più di 200 figure luminose nel cielo stellato.
Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so theyndraw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
甘い　香りで　バルビートを　誘導してn２００　以上の　模様をn夜空に　描く。
あまい　かおりで　バルビートをnゆうどうして　よぞらにnひかりの　サインを　えがく。
달콤한 향기로 볼비트를n유도해서 밤하늘에n빛의 사인을 그린다.
Il utilise son doux parfum pour aider Muciole à décrirendes arabesques dans le ciel nocturne.
Sein süßer Duft leitet Volbeat an, Zeichen aus Lichtnan den Nachthimmel zu malen.
Su suave aroma guía a Volbeat para que haga señalesnluminosas en el cielo nocturno.
Con il suo dolce aroma dirige il volo di Volbeat,nche disegna figure luminose nel cielo stellato.
With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to drawnsigns with light in the night sky.
甘い　香りで　バルビートをn誘導して　夜空にn光の　サインを　描く。
あまい　かおりで　バルビートを　ひきよせる。nたくさん　あつまった　バルビートを　ゆうどうしてnよぞらに　きかがくてきな　ずけいを　えがくぞ。
달콤한 향기로 볼비트를 유인한다.n많이 모인 볼비트를 유도하여n밤하늘에 기하학적인 도형을 그린다.

Lumivole peut attirer un essaim de Muciole grâce à sonndoux parfum. Une fois les Muciole rassemblés, ce Pokémonndirige cette nuée lumineuse et lui fait dessiner des figuresngéométriques dans la nuit étoilée.
Illumise zieht ganze Scharen Volbeat mit seinem süßlichennDuft an. Dann lässt es diesen hell leuchtenden Schwarmngeometrische Figuren aus Licht an den Nachthimmel malen.
Illumise atrae mediante su dulce aroma a enjambres denVolbeat. Una vez que los ha agrupado, les guía en el vuelonpara que dibujen formas geométricas en el lienzo del oscuroncielo.

Illumise attrae uno sciame di Volbeat con la sua fragranzandolce. Una volta radunato un gruppo di Volbeat, Illumisendirige lo sciame luminoso, che disegna così figurengeometriche nel setoso cielo notturno.
Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance.nOnce the Volbeat have gathered, this Pokémon leads thenlit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas ofnthe night sky.
甘い　香りで　バルビートを　引き寄せる。n沢山　集まった　バルビートを　誘導してn夜空に　幾何学的な　図形を　描くぞ。
バルビートを　ゆうどうして　サインを　えがく。nふくざつな　サインを　えがく　イルミーゼほどnなかまから　そんけいされると　いわれているよ。
볼비트를 유도하여 사인을 그린다.n복잡한 사인을 그리는 네오비트일수록n동료에게 존경받는다고 전해진다.
Lumivole dirige un vol de Muciole lumineux pour dessinerndes figures dans la nuit étoilée. On raconte que ce Pokémonngagne le respect de ses pairs en composant des figuresncomplexes dans le ciel.
Illumise leitet einen Schwarm Volbeat an, wenn sie Zeichennan den Nachthimmel malen. Je komplexer diese werden,ndesto mehr Respekt bekommt es von seinen Artgenossen.
Illumise guía en el vuelo a un grupo de iluminados Volbeatnpara que hagan dibujos en el oscuro cielo. Según dicen,ncuanto más complejos sean los dibujos, más le respetan losnmiembros de su grupo.
Illumise dirige i voli dei Volbeat luminosi per disegnare figurennel cielo notturno. Pare che guadagni maggior rispetto dainsuoi simili componendo disegni sempre più complessi.
Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs innthe night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respectnfrom its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
バルビートを　誘導して　サインを　描く。n複雑な　サインを　描く　イルミーゼほどn仲間から　尊敬されると　いわれているよ。
